name: The Secret of Captain Cannon's Booty
name_original: The Secret of Captain Cannon's Booty
description:
A first-person game in which you play a treasurehunter, who wants to find the infamous booty of Captain Cannon. Little did you know that the ship is haunted by his crew! Avoid the ghosts while solving puzzles and getting to that booty!

"The Secret of Captain Cannon's Booty"

was made by

Jonas Margraf

(Gamedesign, Leveldesign, Programming, Sound, Lighting)

and

Sina Hofmann

(Character- , Environment- and Prop-design, Modelling, Texturing, Animation)

for our Bachelor's Degree at the University of Applied Sciences Mainz.

(This is a Vertical Slice, it contains one Level)
